channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: All I Want For Christmas Is A Republican Party That Actually Cares About Saving The Country
item.description: If Republicans keep focusing on performative politics, they're going to lock themselves out of government.

item.title: Exclusive: Angle Health raises $134 million Series B to grow its AI-driven healthcare benefits offerings
item.description: Angle Health has raised a $134 million Series B, led by Portage, Fortune has exclusively learned.

item.title: How Florida Can Reform Property Taxes To Incentivize Young Families
item.description: States need not punish seniors, but tax policies must be structured in such a way so as not to freeze younger generations out of the market.

item.title: Top 5 Moments From SCOTUS Arguments In Key Pro-Life Pregnancy Center Case
item.description: 'Now I don't know how to read that other than it's pretty self-executing to me, counsel,' said Justice Neil Gorsuch.

item.title: James Solomon elected Jersey City mayor, turning away ex-NJ Gov. Jim McGreevey's comeback bid
item.description: James Solomon was elected mayor of Jersey City on Tuesday, thwarting former New Jersey Gov. Jim McGreevey's bid for a political comeback.

item.title: A Chinese ice cream chain, powered by super-cheap cones, now has more outlets than McDonald’s
item.description: Chilled drinks and cool prices are helping Mixue take over the booming sweet treat market.

item.title: Trump admin's energy agenda hailed for crucial 'wins' as green activists lash out
item.description: Conservative energy groups are celebrating a slate of Trump-era deregulation wins, while environmental activists argue the moves enrich industry giant...

item.title: Michael Dell, who’s donating $6.25 billion to ‘Trump Accounts’ for kids, says a childhood savings account changed his life
item.description: Also: All the news and watercooler chat from Fortune.

item.title: The Mamdani Myth of International Law
item.description: New York City’s mayor-elect ignores American sovereignty.

item.title: Trump administration strikes deal with Ohio to clean up state voter rolls using federal database

item.title: The Not-So-Nefarious Reason for White Crime Stat Confusion
item.description: Misclassification is not part of some elaborate plot.

item.title: Van Epps wins in Tennessee special election
item.description: Republican Matt Van Epps scored a closely watched win Tuesday over Democratic state Rep. Aftyn Behn in a special congressional election in Tennessee.

item.title: Dracula Reimagined as Socialist Trauma
item.description: Radu Jude puts a stake through diabolical politics.

item.title: Why Every Red-Blooded American Man Should Read ‘Pride And Prejudice’
item.description: Austen offers carefully-worded criticisms of a stuffy English society, evincing a certain sympathy for the freedom enjoyed by her 'American cousins.'

item.title: Trump’s pick for chairman isn’t enough to threaten Fed independence, says Bank of America—especially if Jerome Powell decides to stick around
item.description: "The question then becomes, will Powell leave as a governor?"

item.title: War Secretary Hegseth highlights US 'Drone Dominance' push for mass adoption in modern warfare
item.description: War Secretary Pete Hegseth highlights the United States' "Drone Dominance" push to equip the military with a massive quantity of drones.

item.title: Minnesota’s Massive Welfare Fraud Scandal
item.description: The billion-dollar fraud scheme based out of the Somali diaspora community has implications beyond dollars and cents.

item.title: Vital SCOTUS Case Tests The President’s Absolute Authority To Remove Executive Branch Officials
item.description: The Constitution is clear that all executive authority resides in the president.

item.title: Justice Department expands legal action against states that have refused its demands for voter data
item.description: The Justice Department on Tuesday sued six more states in its ongoing campaign to obtain detailed voter data and other election information.

item.title: Anthropic considers IPO despite warnings that excess liquidity is blowing a bubble in the markets
item.description: Senior central bank chiefs see excess liquidity in a range of asset markets.

item.title: The Problem with the Republican Party? All the Democrats
item.description: The GOP should summon the gumption to persuade converts to the Trump movement of the virtues of Republicanism.
